plot: What would happen should the United States leave the international scene, and become again a &"normal nation&", a republic, and not an empire? To find an answer to this question, director and producer Mitch Anderson embarked on an investigative trip on four continents. &"The World Without US&" is an in-depth investigation of how US foreign policy affects the lives of millions of people around the world.   Written by  Mitch Anderson Studios
title: The World Without US
